resources.string: Allows FlipLock to turn off your screen when appropriate triggers occurs.
You pocket it, we lock it.
Give Lazilock access to your lock.
Device Admin disabled, you may now uninstall this app as per normal.
Your device is unsupported. Thanks for your interest though.

Step 0. Don\'t press lock button. Step 1. Put phone in pocket.
Step 2. Know that it\'s locked.
Step 3. Smile.
